articles.title: Ruth Langsford: Eamonn Holmes addresses wife’s tearful TV moment ‘She had her reasons' - Express
articles.description: RUTH LANGSFORD - who fronts This Morning with her husband Eamonn Holmes - was left in tears on Alan Carr's Epic Gameshow last night after the pair scooped £33,000 for Ruth's chosen charity, the Alzheimer's Society.
